Name: Puttin' Around
About the game: Puttin' Around is a fun spin on online mini golf games which features fun game modes to play with others online around the world. The controls and play style are intuitive and make it easy to jump into or host a game. Play along with your friends, or make new ones. Key Features Dedicated servers around the world Up to 10 player in online multiplayer Level editor with Steam Workshop to share and download maps Chose between traditional mini golf, or play a round of Point Control
